text: Lars Martin Jørgensen (; born 6 October 1975) is a Danish former professional footballer who currently works as a scout for AGF. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Cup Continental Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals AGF 1993–94 Superliga 6 2 — 6 2 1994–95 21 4 — 21 4 1995–96 25 1 4Appearances in UEFA Intertoto Cup 1 29 2 1996–97 30 6 2Appearances in UEFA Cup Winners' Cup 0 32 6 Total 82 13 6 1 88 14 Udinese 1997–98 Serie A 20 2 — 1Appearances in UEFA Cup / UEFA Europa League 0 21 2 1998–99 28 4 2 0 2 0 32 4 1999–2000 30 7 — 8 0 38 7 2000–01 27 4 — 3 0 30 4 2001–02 19 6 1 1 — 20 7 2002–03 27 4 — — 27 4 2003–04 34 3 1 0 2 0 37 3 Total 185 30 4 1 16 0 205 31 Fiorentina 2004–05 Serie A 30 3 3 0 — 33 3 2005–06 37 7 1 0 — 38 7 2006–07 35 3 — — 35 3 2007–08 26 0 3 0 11 2 40 2 2008–09 10 1 — 3Two appearances in UEFA Champions League, one appearance in UEFA Cup 0 13 1 2009–10 13 0 — 5Appearances in UEFA Champions League 1 18 1 Total 151 14 7 0 19 3 177 17 AGF 2009–10 Superliga 13 0 — — 13 0 2010–11 1st Division 24 2 2 0 — 26 2 2011–12 Superliga 32 5 1 0 — 33 5 2012–13 14 1 2 1 2 0 18 2 2013–14 17 0 2 0 — 19 0 2014–15 1st Division 12 1 — — 12 1 Total 112 9 7 1 2 0 121 10 Career total 530 66 18 2 43 4 591 72 ;Notes ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Denmark 1998 12 1 1999 10 2 2000 3 0 2001 6 1 2002 6 0 2003 9 3 2004 12 3 2005 10 1 2006 8 1 2007 6 0 2008 3 0 2009 8 0 2010 6 0 2011 3 0 Total 102 12 :Scores and results list Denmark's goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Jørgensen goal.
